admin_role.description: Can manage all aspects of the organization
admin_role.name: Admin

approval_role.description: Can approve or deny a workflow approval node
approval_role.name: Approve

auditor_role.description: Can view all aspects of the organization
auditor_role.name: Auditor

credential_admin_role.description: Can manage all credentials of the organization
credential_admin_role.name: Credential Admin

execute_role.description: May run any executable resources in the organization
execute_role.name: Execute

inventory_admin_role.description: Can manage all inventories of the organization
inventory_admin_role.name: Inventory Admin

job_template_admin_role.description: Can manage all job templates of the organization
job_template_admin_role.name: Job Template Admin

member_role.description: User is a member of the organization
member_role.name: Member

notification_admin_role.description: Can manage all notifications of the organization
notification_admin_role.name: Notification Admin

project_admin_role.description: Can manage all projects of the organization
project_admin_role.name: Project Admin

read_role.description: May view settings for the organization
read_role.name: Read

workflow_admin_role.description: Can manage all workflows of the organization
workflow_admin_role.name: Workflow Admin
